segments.text: Hmm . You have three cameras . Are you a photographer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , my company makes cameras.Well , I'm also a photographer , but two of these are for our display .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . And what's in this bag ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you said you didn't have any food with you today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you meant vegetables and meat when you asked me . Things like that . I don't have any vegetables .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , Mr . Lee . Egg tarts are food too . We will have to confiscate these .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we will have to dispose of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's too bad . They are very delicious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . One out of every three travelers from Taiwan seems to be carrying them.They are being smuggled in by the thousands .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not today at least . Enjoy your visit to the United States , Mr . Lee .
segments.speaker: S1
